  • Method Details

    • createRooms

      public void createRooms()
      Initializes the rooms when a hotel is created.

    • bookReservation

      public boolean bookReservation(String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut, int roomNum)
      Books a reservation via a given name, check in and out date, and a room number. The check in date must always be earlier than the check out date.
      Parameters:
      guestName - a string that signifies the one reserving the room.
      checkIn - an integer from 1-30 that signifies the day the guest has checked in.
      checkOut - an integer from 2-31 that signifies the day the guest will check out.
      roomNum - an integer that signifies the chosen room that will be reserved.
      Returns:
      true if booked successfully, false if otherwise.

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(String guestName)
      Removes a reservation given by a certain guest's name
      Parameters:
      guestName - is a string that is within a reservation; used for searching the list.
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed, false if otherwise.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation(int roomNum, int checkIn, int checkOut)

    • addRoom

      public boolean addRoom(int numRooms)
      Adds rooms to a hotel depending on the amount wanted if the max rooms have not been reached.
      Parameters:
      numRooms - is an integer, the number of rooms that the user wants to be added.
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, false if otherwise.

    • removeRoom

      public boolean removeRoom(int roomNum)
      Removes rooms that don't have a reservation, given an integer.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - is an integer; the amount of rooms that the user wants to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if succesfully removed, false if otherwise.

    • changeHotelName

      public boolean changeHotelName(String newName)
      Changes the name of the hotel name.
      Parameters:
      newName - is a string that signifies the new name of the hotel.
      Returns:
      true

    • showRoomList

      public void showRoomList()
      Shows all the name of the rooms that exist within a hotel.

    • getRoomIndex

      public int getRoomIndex(int roomNum)
      returns the index of a room, given a room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - is an integer; the number of the room that the user wants to find the index of.
      Returns:
      the index of the room if successful, -1 if otherwise

    • getReservIndex

      public int getReservIndex(String guest)
      returns the index of a reservation, given the guest's name.
      Parameters:
      guest - is a string, which is the guest's name in the reservation.
      Returns:
      the index of the reservation if successful, -1 if otherwise.

    • getRoomAvailability

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRoomAvailability(int date)
      Returns the list of rooms that aren't booked, given a single date.
      Parameters:
      date - is an integer, the day in where you want to find all free rooms.
      Returns:
      a list of integers, they signify the rooms that are not booked in that day.

    • getRoomAvailability

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRoomAvailability(int checkIn, int checkOut)
      Returns the list of rooms that aren't booked, within a span of time greater than a 1 day.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - is an integer; the start of the timespan
      checkOut - is an integer; the end of the timespan
      Returns:
      a list of integers, they signify the rooms that are not booked in that day.

    • changePrice

      public boolean changePrice(float price)
      Changes the price of staying in a room in the hotel, depending on the new given price.
      Parameters:
      price - is the new price that the user wants it changed to.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if unsuccessful. The minimum price is 100.

    • getTotalEarnings

      public float getTotalEarnings()
      Returns the total expected earnings of a hotel.
      Returns:
      a float, the sum of every reservation in a hotel.

    • getRoomsList

      public ArrayList<Room> getRoomsList()
      Returns the ArrayList of rooms, where all the rooms are stored within a hotel.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of rooms

    • getReservationsList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationsList()
      Returns the ArrayList of reservations, where all reservations are stored within a hotel.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of reservations.

      public String getHotelName()
      Returns the name of the hotel.
      Returns:
      a string, the name of the hotel.

    • getNumRooms

      public int getNumRooms()
      Returns the number of rooms in a hotel.
      Returns:
      an integer, the number of rooms in the hotel.

    • getPrice

      public float getPrice()
      Returns the price of the rooms in the hotel.
      Returns:
      a float value; the price of the rooms in the hotel.
